long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Website Safety Checker is an essential online security tool brought to you by EvenInsight.com.

Empowering users to navigate the web safely, Website Safety Checker swiftly identifies fraudulent and fake websites with just one click. By leveraging its advanced algorithms, this tool fortifies internet browsers, shielding users from potential scams, malicious links, and dubious redirections.

➤ How to Use Website Safety Checker?

● Install the Extension: Simply add the Website Safety Checker extension to your Chrome browser.
● Click and Check: Whenever you stumble upon an unfamiliar website, click on the Green Icon provided by the extension.
● Safety Report: Instantly access a comprehensive safety report detailing the security status of the website you're visiting.
● Share Insights: Contribute to the community's safety by sharing your experiences, helping others steer clear of potential scams.


➤ Key Features of Website Safety Checker:

✔️ Effortless Protection: Obtain detailed safety reports of any website with just one click.
✔️ Prevent Scams: Identify fraudulent websites before falling victim to their schemes.
✔️ Risk Awareness: Understand the associated risks linked to each website you encounter.
✔️ Distinguish Safe Sites: Discern between safe and fake websites effortlessly.
✔️ In-depth Analysis: Delve into detailed analyses of past records and ownership details for comprehensive insights.

Stay protected as you explore the vast expanse of the internet with Web Safety Checker – your trusted companion in online security.
